story_block_2: In the summer of last year, I was driving towards Paris and it seemed I was distracted because I did not sleep enough and at one moment I found myself in a serious traffic accident. The car overturned and rolled several times. I had several fractures in my legs and my hands are good. Myself surrounded by my wife and children, despite all that hit me I was grateful that I am still alive
